text.autoconfig.firstperson.title: FirstPerson Settings
text.autoconfig.firstperson.option.xOffs: Moves the body relative to the camera back and forth
text.autoconfig.firstperson.option.sneak: Moves the body relative to the camera back and forth while sneaking
text.autoconfig.firstperson.option.enabl: The default state of the FirstPerson mod after starting the game
text.autoconfig.firstperson.option.dollE: Shows a smaller version of yourself(or the entity you're spectating) at the side of the screen
text.autoconfig.firstperson.option.dollS: Change the scale of the doll
text.autoconfig.firstperson.option.dollL: Change how much the (locked) head looks to the left/right
Change how much the (locked) head looks Up/Down
When locked, the doll will look into the direction setup above, else it will look the same way the player does
text.autoconfig.firstperson.option.sitXO: Moves the body relative to the camera back and forth while sitting
text.autoconfig.firstperson.option.force: Forces the FirstPerson Mod when other mods modify the rendering, but will cause visual issues(for example the players head is missing)
